original_title: A White Christmas with Lorie Line
overview: Pianist Lorie Line takes the stage at the elegant Historic Stage Theatre in downtown Minneapolis in this highly entertaining and captivating holiday performance. Accompanied by her world-class 12-musician Pop Chamber Orchestra, Line has created an incredible charming, dazzling, flashy Broadway-style show. A fun, exciting 100% purely pleasurable new live music DVD. An eight-camera shoot with 147 lights and 58 microphones, this DVD was mastered as though you were sitting in row 10 at a Lorie Line concert!
title: A White Christmas with Lorie Line
